name: Grupo Firme
description: '''Grupo Firme''' is a [[regional Mexican]] band based in [[Tijuana]], [[Baja California]], that specializes in [[Sinaloa|Sinaloan]] music. Formed in 2014, they have received nominations for a variety of awards that include [[Latin Grammy Awards|Latin Grammy]], [[Premios Juventud]] and [[Lo Nuestro Awards|Premio Lo Nuestro]], being the winner in 2021 of the latter in five categories.
